title: William Faulkner's barn burning
creator_credit: Peter Werner, Calvin Skaggs and Learning in Focus
brief_description: Based on a William Faulkner story set in the late nineteenth century in which a young boy faces the agonizing decision of whether or not to betray his embittered father, who burns his employer’s barn in an act of revenge. Series hosted by Henry Fonda and stars Tommy Lee Jones.
